message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $110 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $120. This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll see that value.
